name: Nail 'em (enderswype)
description:
After the crically acclaimed Deep Sea and Menorah's quest, pepnou and enderswype are proud to let you play there new game, an original game idea for the GMTK jam 2021 theme : joined tegether.

Nail 'em !

You are BoB the slime in his warehouse, infested by weird giant explosive flies. You miss summer barbecue so you decide to make your own skewer here, in the warehouse, with those dumb flies.

Controls : 

A - D - SPACE - SHIFT - left clic

or

J - L - SPACE - Right-SHIFT - left clic

to move - jump - dash - shoot

pro tip : you regenerate a heart for every 1000 points you score.

Have fun !
